pages.title: Blazunia
pages.text: The $(c:/create ponder creatania:blazunia @a)Blazunia$(/c) is a powerful magical firey flower.

pages.title: Corrupt Mana Block
pages.text: This purplish block consists of $(l:patchouli:machines#manacondenser)condensed$(/l) Mana, though it seems corrupted and inert. Should be handled with extreme caution.
The Mana Casing is a foundational building block for Creatania's $(l:patchouli:machines#manacondenser)machines$(/l).

pages.title: Pure Mana Block
pages.text: The Pure Mana block is the $(l:patchouli:mana_su#purifying)purified$(/l) version of the Corrupt Mana block. It too is inert but seems quite safe to handle.

pages.title: Real Mana Block
pages.text: The Real Mana block contains all of the magical properties of Botania Mana but in block form. We are finding more and more uses for this block.

The $(c:/create ponder creatania:xor_lever @a)XOR Lever$(/c) behaves like an XOR logic gate and does not pass a redstone signal through the block mounted to. The lever only powers the block it is pointing to. The XOR Lever can be mounted horizontally or vertically.
